input.sentences: the parade went down the street .
the man drove his tractor in the parade .
the boy posed inside the machine .
the boy posed in the tractor .
the girls sat in the claw .
output.sentences: It was exciting to get the vehicles ready for a street parade.
I was excited for my first time to take the tractor in the parade, I even drove it.
My friends posed their children on the inside of the machine.
They had a tractor that my brother posed his little boy on.
My sister sat her girls inside the claw to take pictures before heading home.
